name: Voidborn BETA
description:
A funny little RPG game, where you follow the Adventures of Nyte, the Voidborn Prince,  in a fucked up Universe (type Saints Row 4), his little journey in Earth where he will make new friends and lose others, in order to find himself in this world, and find about the mysteries of his father vanishing.

NB: Your Anti-Virus might consider it as a Virus so be sure to disable it before downloading it, and don't forget to reactivate it post-download.
